name: csv2j
description: CLI to convert CSV to JSON with number and boolean coercion.
author: Kevin Morris

scripts.release:patch: npm run tag:patch && git push --follow-tags && npm run publish:npm
scripts.release:minor: npm run tag:minor && git push --follow-tags && npm run publish:npm
scripts.release:major: npm run tag:major && git push --follow-tags && npm run publish:npm
